attributes.action: Force TV companies to remove onscreen text and logos during programmes.
attributes.additional_details: Onscreen text and logos are distracting, annoying, can obstruct viewing, can cause screen burn on TVs and are totally unnecessary.
attributes.background:
Allow this petition so the people of the UK can make known their feelings on this subject.

Most people, I believe, do not like or want these viewing intrusions and object to the damage they can cause to expensive TV set screens.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
